info.name: Anime Haven - Simply Dark v1.6
info.description: Just a variation of my Cyan Darkness without the cyan, figured some people might prefer a more simplistic style.
info.additionalInfo: - v1.6 Basic style update, Future update's may be necessary as Anime Haven change's over time.
